title.narrative: 4.1 NORMATIVE FRAMEWORK

description.narrative: Output 4.1: By 2018, nutrition sector actors benefit from an enabling environment for all nutrition-specific and nutrition- sensitive activities, including a policy framework and strengthened capacities in planning, coordination and management, which contributes to Nutrition â€“ General, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 4: Children under 5, pregnant and lactating women, particularly among the most vulnerable, have access to and make greater use of quality promotional, preventive and curative services for the prevention of chronic malnutrition, management of acute malnutrition and reduction of micronutrient deficiencies.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 4.1: By 2018, nutrition sector actors benefit from an enabling environment for all nutrition-specific and nutrition-sensitive activities, including a policy framework and strengthened capacities in planning, coordination and management

description.narrative: The endorsement and official launch of the PNSN 2017-2025 and its costed plan of action (2017-2019) showed the high-level government's and global SUN Movement's commitment to support Nutrition agenda in the country by moving forward a multisectoral approach to prevent and fight all forms of malnutrition. | Status:Met | As-of Date:30/01/2019

title.narrative: Existence of a functional national multisectoral committee for nutrition
A functional SUN/UN network exists
Existence of a national multi-sectoral social and behavior change communication strategy for nutrition
Nutrition sector plan or policy that includes a risk management strategy to address disaster/crisis risk available
A budgeted national action plan for the national nutrition security policy exists
Implementation of a national strategy to prevent stunting in children
National management information system that includes disaggregated (age, sex, urbal/rural) data on nutrition available
